definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: I'll walk, trot , canter or gallop to be near you.
sentences.chinese: 我會步行，小跑，慢跑或馳騁在靠近你。

sentences.english: Two female joggers noticed I was stuck and asked if I needed assistance.
sentences.chinese: 兩名正在慢跑的女性發現了我，問我是否需要幫助。

sentences.english: The jogger made an analytical analogy between the ecology and geology .
sentences.chinese: 慢跑者在生態學和地質學之間進行了切析類比。

sentences.english: Now's a good time to give water jogging or water aerobics a try.
sentences.chinese: 就趁現在去試試水中慢跑或者水中有氧運動。

sentences.english: You should also be finishing your run with a 5-minute walk or easy jog.
sentences.chinese: 你最後也應該以5分鐘步行或者慢跑結束。

sentences.english: I dislike jogging early in the morning.
I made a mental note to go for my second jog of the year soon.
sentences.chinese: 我便在腦子了計劃要儘快展開我在今年的第二次慢跑。

sentences.english: Start with jogging before work and stop eating fast food.
sentences.chinese: 那就從上班前的慢跑和告別快餐開始。

sentences.english: To lose weight, I jog for 100km every morning.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減肥，我每天早上慢跑100公里。

sentences.english: Years of faithful exercise and wearing a jogging bra had kept her body tone firm.
sentences.chinese: 多年堅持鍛鍊並戴着慢跑乳罩使她的身體十分健康。

sentences.english: All were told to run after the jogger and watch him.
sentences.chinese: 所有被試者都被要求跟在一個慢跑者身後進行觀察。

sentences.english: But by now -the whole party was moving off at a brisk canter.
sentences.chinese: 但現在這一羣紳士以輕快的慢跑統統行動起來了。

sentences.english: Today I was with my dog ​​when jogging in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 今天我牽着我的狗狗到森林中慢跑。

sentences.english: Loud laugh has become a healthy activity like jogging and Yuga.
sentences.chinese: 大笑，與慢跑和瑜伽一樣，已然成爲健康運動。

sentences.english: My favorite tree and pond, we enjoyed the beautiful view and the wildflowers while we jogging.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的樹和湖，我們圍着草地一路沾花惹草地慢跑。

sentences.english: The competitors cantered into the arena to conclude the closing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 選手們慢跑進入競技場，爲閉幕式畫上了句號。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
to take a walk/to go for a walk
